formattedAddress: 350 W 43rd St, New York, NY 10036, USA
adrFormatAddress: 350 W 43rd St, New York, NY 10036-6454, USA

originalText.text:
Was there 2018 to 2021

Great staff and views.

There were a couple of people that seemed like they were not working. Any issues that are not addressed or taking very long to resolve, escalate them to the building manager, he is very helpful!

Was not a fan of the leasing office

originalText.text: The staff is so friendly and helpful. Their kind faces are sure to bring you joy whenever you see them no matter what kind of day you’ve had! The apartments are spacious(relatively) with good views depending on the floor and side you’re at. Gym and the club are quite alright too!

text.text: The staff is so friendly and helpful. Their kind faces are sure to bring you joy whenever you see them no matter what kind of day you’ve had! The apartments are spacious(relatively) with good views depending on the floor and side you’re at. Gym and the club are quite alright too!

originalText.text:
Excellent and friendly staff and mentioned elsewhere here by other people.

Extremely happy with maintenance and communication over small issues (Ex. drain problem late at night, someone was sent over the very next morning with a nice courtesy call first).

For the location and the included amenities, this place is great.

Noise from the outside in units facing south is loud but inter-unit noise is virtually non-existent.

originalText.text:
Facilities are well kept! Excellent front desk staff, porters and handymen whom I've become friends with in the three years I've lived here - although the same cannot be said for the management.

Friedman management, the leasing office as well as the building superintendent all share a nonchalant attitude that suggests they could care less about the welfare of their residents. It's been frustrating dealing with them. Often times requests for assistance or information are brash/unhelpful/infuriating if you are even able to get a reply at all.

originalText.text: I'm giving 5 stars for the wonderful staff at Ivy Tower. Everyone from the doorman to the porters are friendly, warm and courteous. I never felt unsafe at Ivy Tower during the few years I lived there. The views from the taller building are incredible and the amenities are nice.
